description:
During a beautiful spring day in Kyoto, Aya and Miki follow the student council president Midori to a board game shop. The three students end up discovering a German board game that causes them to realize their shared passion for games. In the coming days, many more board games will be found and played!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description: Made his directorial debut with [Katekyou Hitman Reborn!](https://anilist.co/anime/1604/), in which he storyboarded half of the episodes.

__Birthplace:__ Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Daughter:__ [Ryouko Maekawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120430)

__Atsushi Maekawa__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter for anime, while he also occasionally writes lyrics for music.

__Height:__ 158 cm
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kohno-marika.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marika_0222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marika_kohno/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marika_Kouno) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高野麻里佳)

She is part of the seiyuu idol group [**Earphones**](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) (イヤホンズ) with fellow voice actresses [Rie Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/119331) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non-anime roles:**
• Primavera - Memento Mori (VG)

[Profile](http://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/tomita_miyu/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/miyu-tomita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyju_tomita) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tomita__miyu._/)

The Grand Prix winner of the 2014 Seiyuu Artist Training Program Selection competition, which was sponsored by Amuse and Ken Production. After being scouted by six talent agencies, she eventually joined Amuse.

She made her voice acting debut in 2015, voicing a number of unnamed characters in Himouto Umaru-chan.

Non-Anime Roles
• Layla - Genshin Impact (VG)
• Zara - Memento Mori (VG)
• New Jersey - Azur Lane (VG)
• Jiu Niangzi - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/SAKI_MIYASHITA) | [Profile](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=13083)

Saki Miyashita is a Japanese voice actress who was affiliated with Sigma Seven but is now affiliated with Haikyō.
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.
**Mitsunori Yamaguchi** is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor and animation director.
